name: Truck Company Tycoon
description:
TRUCK COMPANY TYCOON v.1.1 - 

You have a Truck Company

that you can run. Make contracts,

hire your people and start your trucks.

Handdrawn Graphics and nice sounds

Do Missions with your hud on the sidebar.

It's a Business Simulator for €79.00.

Runs on different Systems in your

Browser. This program is Shareware.
